metadata.title: Remove Frictionless Workflow Callout Copy from Landing Page

context.background: User requested removal of the landing-page instructional/workflow callout text under the workflow sequence section.

design_constraints.constraint: Remove the callout cleanly without leaving awkward spacing.
Preserve the section layout and remaining feature content.

instruction.step: Remove the "Frictionless workflow" callout block from the landing page workflow sequence section.
Run `npm run typecheck` after the change.
Use Chrome DevTools MCP to verify the landing page no longer shows the removed text and no console errors occur.

validation_checklist.check: The specified callout text is no longer visible on the landing page.
Chrome DevTools MCP verification is recorded.

acceptance_criteria.criterion: Landing page workflow section no longer contains the removed callout text.
Task XML is updated with evidence and renamed `DONE_` on completion.
